app

Class CVM2

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
      • app.CVM2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

    public class CVM2
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.AbstractCVM
    La CVM2 est un exemple d'execution de 10 producteurs et 5 consommateurs. Les producteurs envoient 2 messages chacun. Le premier message appartient au topic A et B. Le second appartient au topic C. Les consommateurs s'abonnent au topic A. Les consommateurs doivent recevoir 10 messages chacun correspondant aux messages du topic A. Il existe 5 consommateurs.

      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void shutdown()
      shut down the CVM, synchronising with the other JVM when distributed, i.e. all of the deployed components in the CVM are shut down; inspired from the Java Executor framework.
      boolean startStandardLifeCycle(long duration)
      start the complete standard life-cycle of the component virtual machine to execute the application.

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI
        shut down the CVM, synchronising with the other JVM when distributed, i.e. all of the deployed components in the CVM are shut down; inspired from the Java Executor framework.

        Contract

         pre    this.allFinalised()
 post   this.isShutdown()       // The shutting down state has still to be

        Description copied from interface: fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm.ComponentVirtualMachineI

        Parameters:
